name: Elogia
tagline: SPECIALIZED AGENCY IN DIGITAL COMMERCE MARKETING
description: Elogia is a digital agency specializing in digital commerce marketing. The company has more than 15 years of experience and a team of more than 70 people in Barcelona, Madrid, Vigo and Mexico City. They offer social media services, SEO, online planning and online strategic consulting.

locations.address: Jaime Balmes No. 8-104, Col. Los Morales, Polanco, Miguel Hidalgo
